name: Wizard Delivery Service
description:
Created solo using Unreal Engine 4 for ScoreSpace Jam 11

Story

You play an old Wizard who one day retires from adventuring and opens their own delivery service.

Using your Teleport spell, you can instantly teleport any package to the desired location. However each spell requires a series of hand gestures and chants in order to teleport the package to the correct location.

Being a Wizard/Delivery man isn't easy though. Each package is different and is heading to different locations, therefore each package requires a different set of gestures. Even a single incorrect gesture could cause the package to be sent to the incorrect location. Your customers expect excellence - 1 incorrect or delayed package can ruin your business.

Perform the correct gestures in a timely fashion on each package and Teleport them to their desired locations.

Gameplay & Controls

This game is currently only able to be played with Mouse & Keyboard

KEYSACTIONNumber keys: 1, 2, and 3Move to a different teleportation circleArrow keys (↑↓→←)Perform gestures

There are 3 Teleportation Circles that will spawn packages throughout the game.

Move between the Teleportation Circles using 1, 2, and 3 key in order to access different packages.

Once you've selected a package, use the Arrow keys to perform the gestures corresponding to the package (shown at the bottom of the screen)
